ValidationRule.description: This will prevent a User from selecting Term Sheet Issued Stage if a Term Sheet Issued Date has not been entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Term Sheet Issued'), ISBLANK( Term_Sheet_Issued__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Term Sheet Issued Date before updating the Stage to Term Sheet Issued
